website_summaries.verdict: The Focal Spark Wireless headphones deliver a bass-forward sound signature that would benefit from more high-mid presence.
cons: USB port cover can pop off

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds but...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but the design leaves a little to be desired. The battery is a big lump. It's not heavy but it feels off center just a little so it feels weird. Lastly, the directions are just bad. Typically you don't need instructiins for earbuds but these use a series of beeps to communicate and I still haven't figured them out yet. I contacted the company but haven't heard back. But if you keep it simple you will figure it out. Most importantly the sound is awesome so I use them alot.
customer_reviews.author: J. McNichols

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and Seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading numerous reviews about bluetooth earphones from numerous media outlets, and I was not disappointed. The audio quality is excellent for bluetooth, and it is absolutely phenomenal for the price-point. There are some occasional hiccups in the bluetooth signal, but I have experienced that in any pair of bluetooth headphones with audio interference from other sources. The sound, however, is great, and that is why I bought them. I also must mention that the seller was great and seemed genuinely interested that I have a good customer experience. I highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but not good for running or plyometrics
customer_reviews.text: Good sounds. Feel nice in the early. Easy to sync and charge. Would be best for someone sitting in an office that doesn't allow speaker or for students at a library. NOT GOOD FOR ACTIVITIES such as running, jumping, sleds, etc. The little box in-between the earphones is heavy and bounces all around pulling the headphones out of one ear, it's the most annoying thing in the world besides Prius drivers in Los Angeles
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The Focal Spark is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, Let me start off with I’m a Focal fan. I have several pairs of headphones and ear buds. Bower and Wilkins, NAD, AKG, Sennheiser, Klipsch, and Sony. All sound great. Focal has an honest uncolored natural sound. As far as the Spark wireless go, the truth is I wasn’t expecting much at this price point and the fact that these are Bluetooth wireless......These exceeded my expectations, for on the go, the sound is very good. I wanted something for vacation, without getting tangled up in wires. Sound, comfort, and convenience. The Focal Spark wireless is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jon T.

customer_reviews.title: Get these boys
customer_reviews.text: If you have to have quality sound, I'll simply say. Don't let the unfamiliar name brand fool you. These are top level in music and voice. I listen and talk through headphones at least 8 hours everyday and have had nothing this good including every version of LG I've purchased. Test of time is the only test left, to see about build quality.. Happy so far
customer_reviews.author: parker2484

customer_reviews.title: Some reviews can be a little misleading
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality product. Read a lot of reviews on here talking about the fit and earbuds falling out. The key to these headphones is getting the right size ear gels on it. Once you do that these things transform into something amazing. Smooth accurate sound with the deepest lows I've ever heard with headphones. My daily drivers before were a set of wired Bose and these surpass those completely.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilkevinlexie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I used this product three times a week for my commute to work. It has a good sound, although I got better tips from Comply, and it improved the bass response a bit. Connection issues only when my phone is in my pocket and I move too much. Feels sturdy enough for a daily use. Battery life is also good, the only problem being that it gives you a half battery reading when in reality you could have 20% left. I wanted to use these for running but the cable is too uncomfortable for it, even if you use the shirt clip included.
customer_reviews.author: Jarl

customer_reviews.title: Very good bluetooth earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Once I got used to wearing bluetooth headphones. I found these to be very comfortable. I replaced the supplied tips with Comply memory foam tips, which improved the sound isolation and comfort. Only complaint is the occasional stutter in the connection. Very good earphones.
customer_reviews.author: calvin j.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! They beat the pants off of my ...
customer_reviews.text: My first time using wireless earbuds. Work well for me at the gym and at the pool. Great sound! They beat the pants off of my apple wired earbuds. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Hard to connect
customer_reviews.text: Sound is relatively ok, especially for Bluetooth items. The battery does cause some issues with noise caused by the connecting cable bouncing off your clothes. The real issue for me is the difficulty in syncing. I finally figured out a solution for me. Always “forget this device “ when you disconnect. Annoying
customer_reviews.author: herbie

customer_reviews.title: they sound fabulous. i just can't get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: they sound fabulous. i just can't get used to the lumpy module that hangs in the middle; if i put it behind my neck then turning my head unseats one of the buds and if i put it in front it dangles in the air. but they sound fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: rhg2914

customer_reviews.title: Nice buds.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. The sound quality is very good and they fit well. The controls are simple and easy to manipulate and they hold a charge for quite awhile. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Oguin

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but connection range is really bad
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great but the problem is the BT. It will disconnect right away as soon you put your phone on your pocket
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Idica

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad wireless set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wireless set of headphones. Not the best but not the worst either. Set sound seems to be pretty balanced and not extreme. Bluetooth range seems to be good and battery life as well. The battery and the Bluetooth unit have an odd location and just rest in your neck.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Sound was terrible; connection not so good. (Returned them)
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. The sound was terrible, and the bluetooth did not stay connected (to iPhone 6) when you placed the phone in your back pocket. The receiver is on the back of the unit (back of neck), so not sure why having it in your back pocket would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: T. Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, broke very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by the quality of these headphones. For the first few weeks they worked and sounded great, but now they're starting to fall apart. For $100 I expected a pair of headphones that would last longer than a few weeks. I don't recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased them as a Christmas gift and I understand they are of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them as a Christmas gift and I understand they are of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, easy to pair, reasonable price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B SF

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were better.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were better. These easily connect to my iPhone and have decent sound for music, but they are terrible for phone calls. The person I'm trying to talk to cannot hear me and I end up having to move to using the iPhone directly instead of using the headphones. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Krull

customer_reviews.title: Greattttt earbuds!!!
customer_reviews.text: Design: attractive. Buttons are easy to press. Connection: easily connects to device. Let it be known that these are not sweat resistant nor can they be used while exercising. Mine frequently went in & out when I was exercising but I'm not holding the company against that because they didn't promote these as sweat resistant.These are casual wireless earbuds. Sound: good quality sound. Volume can be raised very loud. Very little ambient noise seeks in, if any Overall 4/5 star headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle s.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat uncomforatble, won't stay in my ears well.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the smallest buds, they don't stay in my ears, I really prefer the design of Apple's buds. The sound is good, though. The packaging was terrible, I basically had to rip the box apart to get them out, good luck trying to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Engel

customer_reviews.title: The build quality is really bad. The sound quality is awesome although mid-high is ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it on Dec 19,2017. Aready broken. The build quality is really bad. The sound quality is awesome although mid-high is a bit bad. Still figure it out how to claim as Amazon does not resonsible for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Panot Vesakhavahrinth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Crap Headphones. The bud pops out easily and they weren't helpful in getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gump

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Bad Connection
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews, bought the Focal Spark Wireless headphones. While the sound is good, with reasonable lows, good enough midrange and pleasant highs, this leaves a lot to be desired in the connection department. While I know bluetooth hates walls, cubicles and even the human body, they are expected to connect around 10m (33ft). The Focal Spark was advertised at 15m connectivity. However, the connection started breaking up at as less as 4m. I can't even walk across the hallway without breaking the connection. Now that is a shame. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Sasi Kiran Bonam

customer_reviews.title: 30 days then they died...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent the bad part is I have had them for a little over 30 days and they won't turn on with very very light use. The warranty process is a joke. I have to call around to local shops to try to get them replaced instead of focal fixing the issue... Most likely this will be my last focal product.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Focal Spark Earphones Wireless Black
product_meta.description: Size:earbuds| Color:BlackBluetooth connectivity with the era of streaming platforms has also come that of mobility. This tendency encourages more and more nomadic and readily available solutions. Freedom of movement is essential and, in fact, wireless is now the key to any connected object. With spark wireless, Focal offers an effective response to music enthusiasts who want to combine comfort, quality listening and total freedom of movement. A New way to listen Focal has designed spark to make quality sound accessible to as many people as possible. Without a doubt the best in its class, spark opens the door to fans of dematerialized music who want to enjoy their favorite songs differently, to experience a more authentic sound and new emotions, leaving no room for monotony. Spark offers the perfect sound for music from all music platforms in the modern age of streaming and downloading. The emotion of the present moment thanks to streaming platforms, music is accessible instantly and without limits. A New way of listening totally digitally has become in a short time, one of the first sources of musical consumption, particularly in young and mobile targets. At any time and any place, access to an unlimited number of tracks allows you to choose the desired musical style embodying the emotion of the present moment. Always on hand with its sleek design, spark will always respond to this instant need With discretion and listening comfort. Careful design the design of spark has been studied to make it a stylish and lightweight product. Designed in France, it incorporates the requirement of very precise specifications in order to succeed in this. The body of the aluminum headphones and the three–button remote control with microphone give it an elegant look. The silicone earplugs, The soft touch, flat anti-tangle cable and the rigid carrying case make it easily accessible and very practical to use.
feature_bullets: Spark Wireless headphones bring the distinctive Focal sound to everyone, without sacrificing mobile freedom
Easy to handle and with a simple design, Spark will always meet the need for a high quality sound head on with discretion and comfort
With Spark and its wireless version, you can live the emotion wherever you are, whenever you want, in complete freedom.
Up to 8 hours of battery life
Discover the world of music in high definition
